name: ChatGPT
shortDescription: General-purpose conversational AI for writing, research, and coding assistance.
description: ChatGPT is a conversational AI that assists with drafting, brainstorming, coding help, and answering questions. It leverages GPT-4 architecture for context-aware dialogue across domains.
cons: Requires careful prompting for best results
usageLimits: Free tier: 50 messages/day; Paid tiers higher caps

name: Claude
shortDescription: Safety-focused conversational AI for enterprise and research.
description: Claude (Anthropic) is an AI assistant with strong guardrails to minimize harmful outputs. Excels at summarization, chat, and reasoning with safety and compliance.
dataOwnership: User owns content; data used for improvement with opt-out
piiPolicy: Strict PII filtering and retention controls

name: Google Gemini
shortDescription: Multimodal AI assistant integrated across Google services.
description: Google Gemini is a state-of-the-art multimodal AI that understands text, images, and code. Integrated into Google Workspace for enterprise and consumer use cases.
dataOwnership: Data processed under Google Cloud terms
piiPolicy: Strict PII detection; no storage on free tier

name: Microsoft Copilot
shortDescription: AI assistant built into Microsoft 365 for productivity.
description: Microsoft Copilot embeds AI into Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Teams to automate document creation, data analysis, and meeting summaries under enterprise compliance.

name: DeepSeek
shortDescription: Cost-effective open-source chat model for versatile use.
description: DeepSeek is an open-source conversational AI offering robust fine-tuning and self-hosting for complete control over data and privacy.
usageLimits: None on self-host; managed tier limits apply

name: Grok
shortDescription: Real-time data-connected AI assistant with personality.
description: Grok (xAI) connects to live web data for up-to-date answers and adds a witty, conversational style. Ideal for dynamic information retrieval.

name: Meta AI
shortDescription: AI assistant integrated within Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp.
description: Meta AI offers conversational support inside Meta apps, powering chat, content suggestions, and moderation across social platforms.

name: Perplexity
shortDescription: AI-powered search and Q&A engine.
description: Perplexity is a conversational search engine that cites sources for each answer. Ideal for research tasks with verifiable references.

name: Botpress
shortDescription: Open-source chatbot platform for enterprises.
description: Botpress is an extensible open-source platform enabling developers to build and deploy chatbots with a visual flow editor and robust NLP engine.
cons: Community support only on free tier

name: Kore.ai
shortDescription: Enterprise conversational AI platform supporting 120+ languages.

name: Dialogflow
shortDescription: Google’s NLP platform for building conversational interfaces.
description: Dialogflow enables developers to create conversational agents with intent detection, entity extraction, and integrations across multiple channels.

name: Amazon Lex
shortDescription: AWS service for building voice and text chatbots.
description: Amazon Lex provides ASR and NLU to build conversational interfaces into any application.
priceRange: Speech $4.00 per 1M chars; Text $0.75 per 1K requests

name: UChat
shortDescription: No-code chatbot builder for websites and messaging apps.

description: Modern Hire offers AI-driven interviewing, talent assessment, and candidate experience optimization.

name: SeekOut
shortDescription: AI sourcing and recruiting platform.
description: SeekOut offers AI-powered talent sourcing, diversity hiring, and candidate engagement tools for recruiters.

name: Lemonade
shortDescription: AI-powered digital insurance platform.
description: Lemonade uses AI and behavioral economics to provide renters, homeowners, and pet insurance with fast claims and fraud detection.

name: Tractable
shortDescription: AI for accident and damage assessment.
description: Tractable leverages computer vision and AI to automate damage assessment in auto and property insurance claims for faster claims processing.

name: Shift Technology

description: Shift Technology offers AI-powered fraud detection, claims automation, and analytics to support insurance companies.

description: Zesty.ai uses AI and satellite imagery to assess property risk and help insurers with underwriting and catastrophe modeling.

name: Hopper

description: Hopper uses AI to predict flight and hotel prices, helping users find the best deals and optimize travel plans.

description: Pace Revenue provides AI-driven revenue management and pricing optimization tailored for the hospitality sector.

shortDescription: AI endpoint security and malware protection.
